structure.unit: Sec. 5-2010. - FIRE APPARATUS TO HAVE RIGHT-OF-WAY.

law.text: In the event of an alarm of fire, the apparatus of the Fire Department shall have the right-of-way in and upon the streets, or railroad crossings in going to any fire, or being upon such streets, or railroad crossings. It shall be unlawful for any person to obstruct or willfully fail or refuse to make way for any of such apparatus.
